member.name: AppPolicyWindowingModel
member.summary: The AppPolicyWindowingModel enumeration indicates whether a process uses a CoreWindow-based, or a HWND-based, windowing model.

member.name: AppPolicyWindowingModel.AppPolicyWindowingModel_None
member.summary: Indicates that the process doesn't have a windowing model.

member.name: AppPolicyWindowingModel.AppPolicyWindowingModel_Universal
member.summary: Indicates that the process's windowing model is CoreWindow-based.

member.name: AppPolicyWindowingModel.AppPolicyWindowingModel_ClassicDesktop
member.summary: Indicates that the process's windowing model is HWND-based.

member.name: AppPolicyWindowingModel.AppPolicyWindowingModel_ClassicPhone
member.summary: Indicates that the process's windowing model is Silverlight-based, and does not provide notifications for window state changes.
